narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Comprehensive Children and Family Services is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Sharon, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $20.1M in Medicaid payments across 147K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $20.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
